Plot: A globetrotting hitman and a crestfallen businessman meet in a hotel bar in Mexico City in an encounter that draws them together in a way neither expected.
Title: The Matador
Actors: Pierce Brosnan, Arlin Miller, Azucena Medina, Jonah Meyerson
tomatoConsensus: This humorously amoral, oddball comic thriller features strong performances by Pierce Brosnan and Greg Kinnear as a flamboyant, aging hit-man and an out of work suburban businessman, respectively.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
